title: Genuinely curious, did anyone watch Longlegs and enjoy it??
selftext: Just watched the movie and I thought it was terrible. The story felt confused, the acting was so bad... did anyone watch it and enjoy it?
comments: I watched it yesterday it was good, but people overhyped it.
